title: Accused El Paso Shooter Patrick Crusius Pleads Not Guilty
text:
Patrick Crusius, the 21-year-old accused of killing 22 people at an El Paso Walmart, pleaded not guilty Thursday.

The brief hearing in an El Paso courthouse was Mr. Crusius’ first since the Aug. 3 rampage, which also left 25 people wounded. Authorities believe he drove from his home in the Dallas area to target Hispanic people in the border city. Law-enforcement officials said he had posted online that he hoped to kill as many Hispanic people as possible, claiming they were replacing native-born Americans.
